column1: Relatives and friends are kindly invited. Calling hours will be held on Friday from 4 PM to 8 PM. A celebration of Lindsey's life will be held on Saturday at 8:45 AM from the J. J. Duffy Funeral Home 757 Mendon Road Cumberland. A Mass of Christian Burial will be held at 10 AM in Saint John Paul II Church
column3: Pawtucket. Burial will follow in Resurrection Cemetery
